Banner.Description: I am a junior developer with 1 year of experience creating systems and interfaces. I specialize in Angular and for mobile applications Flutter, writing clean, reusable, and scalable code, following best practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In 1 year of experience, I have covered many roles: backend developer, frontend developer, and designer. I love sharing my knowledge to create new things that help solve problems.
My skills also include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I am working on.
I also program and design things for personal use, whether for a hobby or utility.
Some of the technologies I have trained in and worked with include (but are not limited to):
FeatureProjects.Title: My Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: GoPark
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: GoPark is a web platform built with React JS, Node.js, and Express designed to manage parking lots efficiently. It allows users to view real-time availability of parking spaces and track occupied spots. The platform also features robust reporting capabilities, providing detailed insights into parking usage. With seamless integration and a user-friendly interface, GoPark optimizes parking management and enhances the overall user experience.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: PaySchool
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: PaySchool is a mobile application designed to facilitate payment of services in private schools. It allows users to make transfers and pay for tuition, materials, and extracurricular activities through PayPal and other payment methods. Developed in Flutter and Dart, the platform ensures secure transactions and efficient management of school payments.

Contact.Title: Say Hello!
Contact.Content: I would be happy to hear from you if you'd like to talk about new opportunities. Write to me, and I will respond as soon as I see your message.
